bug.question: I’m a bug that crawls! I have many legs! Who am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I live on the ground, in grass!
💪 I can carry things much bigger than me!

bug.question: I fly and have pretty wings. I love to land on flowers. What am I?

hints.text: ➡️ I used to be a caterpillar!

bug.question: I jump very high! I am green and live in the grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the same color as leaves!
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping!

bug.question: I buzz around and make honey! What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I fly from flower to flower.

bug.question: I light up at night! I have a bright tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I only shine in the dark!

bug.question: I build webs to catch my food! What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I eat flies and other bugs!

bug.question: I am a tiny bug that bites and makes you itchy. What am I?

hints.text: 🙅 You don't want to get too close!

bug.question: I crawl on plants and sometimes eat all the leaves! What am I called before I become a butterfly?
I live underground in a big family and build hills of dirt. What am I?
I'm a shiny bug with red wings and black spots! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often thought to bring good luck!

plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am the color of a frog.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and I'm red and yummy to eat. What am I?
I am tall and have leaves and a trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can make wood from me.

plant.question: I am a small plant with pretty colors. People put me in vases. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I am the color of pumpkins.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit that's green on the outside and red on the inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm a popular fruit in the summer.
🌱 I grow from a vine on the ground.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows under the ground, and you can make fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make french fries with me
🥔 I have eyes, but I cannot see.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat when it gets hot. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🌾 I start as a small seed.
🔥 I need heat to become fluffy.

plant.question: I grow on a vine, and I am green, purple, or red. People make juice and jelly from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤You can make juice out of me.

plant.question: I am a very tall plant, with yellow kernels. People and animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 You can eat me on the cob.
